snippet.title: Big Buck HD Trailer
snippet.description:
The secret's out, y'all - Big Buck HD is almost here, and it's packed with all-new features you ain't never experienced in an arcade game before!

- 1080p HD Gameplay
- Fully Integrated Online Experience, including Facebook and Twitter
- Real-Time Online Showdown Matches from Across the Country
- Unlimited Tournament Play with $1.00 Add-On Tourneys
- In-Game Challenges and Achievement Badges
- Pay with Credit/Debit Cards
- Much, much more!

We've rebuilt and retooled every aspect of the game based on over a decade of experience and feedback from fans like yourself. Keep an eye out for Big Buck HD as it starts showing up in your favorite locations this summer!

Be sure to join the Big Buck Community at www.facebook.com/OfficialBigBuckHunter
